headline: Is Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) a NASDAQ Stock with the Highest Upside Potential?
summary: We recently published a list of the 13 NASDAQ Stocks with the Highest Upside Potential. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) stands against other NASDAQ stocks with high upside potential. On April 7, Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities joined CNBC’s ‘Squawk on the Street’ […]

headline: Struggling AMD Plans Counter Offensive to Halt Nvidia’s Advance
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is knocking on Nvidia’s (NVDA) door. Last week, the plucky semiconductor challenger announced the completion of its $4.9 billion acquisition of ZT Systems for its expertise in systems and rack-level design. The goal is to accelerate the design and deployment of AMD-powered AI infrastructure. This market is currently dominated by NVIDIA and is expected to exceed $1 trillion within a few years. headline: Prediction: 2 AI Stocks Will Be Worth More Than Palantir Technologies by Early 2026
summary: Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock has returned 910% since the inception of the artificial intelligence boom in late 2022, and the company is currently worth $200 billion.  Aaron Rakers at Wells Fargo recently maintained his AMD forecast at $140 per share.  It also implies a market value of $227 billion.
